body.p: Attackers may seek fame or to damage the 's brand by defacing or denying access to the Shopping platform.

ol.li: Compromise of Shop application (ability to write or delete on the webserver for defacing)

section.p: Overall, risk of card data loss is significantly reduced as card data is destroyed after two weeks - only the last four digits remain.

ol.li: Application functionality, testing, frequent framework patching.
Software WAF (MOD Security) implemented to mitigate some intrusion attempts. Third party DDoS protection may be needed: CloudFlare and/or Global Load balancing.
